title: Heavy Duty Combined Cleaning (sifter) Integrated Flour mill Machine EPC provider: www.immy.cn

subtasks: Start the combine harvester
Operate the steering while moving the combine through the field
Adjust the combine's speed
Monitor the combine's auger and conveyor belts
Oversee the combine's threshing process
Check the grain elevator for blockages
Inspect the combine's cleaning system
Address any malfunctions or issues during operation
Keep an eye on the harvesting progress
Guide the harvest cart into position under the combine's auger
Operate the combine's unloading mechanism to load grain into the cart
Ensure the grain is unloaded efficiently and safely
Check the grain for quality and consistency while loading
Move the cart to the next loading point

tasks.task: Performing post-harvest maintenance on the combine
subtasks: Shutdown the combine harvester
Clean the combine's exterior and blades
Service the filters and air intakes
Check and replace any worn or damaged parts
Lubricate moving parts and apply grease
Inspect the tires and make adjustments as needed
Check fluid levels and refill as necessary
Operate the utility vehicle to transport tools and equipment
Navigate the fields and farm roads safely
Inspect the vehicle's performance and brakes
Refuel the utility vehicle if needed
Perform basic maintenance checks on the utility vehicle
